definition: sinuous/devious/full details of a story/to stoop
same as 逶 in 逶迤 winding, curved
to entrust/to cast aside/to shift (blame etc)/to accumulate/roundabout/winding/dejected/listless/committee member/council/end/actually/certainly

sentences.english: But I will no longer importune my young cousin.
sentences.chinese: 可是我也不願意委曲我那年輕的表妹。

sentences.english: With only one day off in a week working people had barely enough time to arrange the household.
sentences.chinese: 一週蘇息一地利，下班族只能偶然間委曲佈置家務。

sentences.english: In this life, I can only get the settling in tears.
sentences.chinese: 在這場生命裏，我的委曲求全也只能換來以淚洗面。
你象是受了委曲的樣子。

sentences.english: The careful ma fantastic is scarcely scared by the scarce parcel.
sentences.chinese: 小心外子委曲被有數的包裹嚇了一下。

sentences.english: We have only just enough milk to last till Friday.
sentences.chinese: 我們現有的牛奶委曲可以維持到星期五。

sentences.english: The other person's achievements are beyond us; we must resign ourselves to being inferior.
sentences.chinese: 其他人的成就超過我們，我們必須委曲自己處於下風。

sentences.english: Behind every successful man, there is a woman looking for.
sentences.chinese: 每一個成功男人的背後，都有一個委曲的女人。

sentences.english: When we are wronged, to be patient to listen to our cry of the people, are the parents.
sentences.chinese: 當咱們遭到委曲，能耐煩聽咱們哭訴的人，是怙恃。

definition: to feel wronged/to cause sb to feel wronged/grievance
to feel compassion for/to pity on/to feel sorry for
